title: Prohibits discrimination based upon the occupation of a person under certain circumstances
summary: Prohibits discrimination based upon the occupation of a person under certain circumstances, such as seeking a house exclusively for residential purposes; defines the term "occupation".

       AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting  discrimi-
         nation under certain circumstances based on a person's occupation

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 292 of the executive law is amended by adding a new
    2  subdivision 35 to read as follows:
    3    35. THE TERM "OCCUPATION" INCLUDES ANY LAWFUL VOCATION, PROFESSION, OR
    4  FIELD OF SPECIALIZATION.

    6  law,  as  amended by chapter 106 of the laws of 2003, is amended to read
    7  as follows:

    9  being  the  owner, lessee, proprietor, manager, superintendent, agent or
   10  employee of any place of  public  accommodation,  resort  or  amusement,
   11  because  of the race, creed, color, national origin, sexual orientation,
   12  military status, sex, OCCUPATION, or disability or marital status of any
   13  person, directly or indirectly, to refuse, withhold from or deny to such
   14  person any of the accommodations, advantages, facilities  or  privileges
   15  thereof,  including the extension of credit, or, directly or indirectly,
   16  to publish, circulate, issue, display,  post  or  mail  any  written  or
   17  printed  communication,  notice or advertisement, to the effect that any
   18  of the accommodations, advantages, facilities and privileges of any such
   19  place shall be refused, withheld from or denied to any person on account
   20  of race, creed, color, national  origin,  sexual  orientation,  military
   21  status,  sex,  OCCUPATION,  or disability or marital status, or that the
   22  patronage or custom thereat of any person of or purporting to be of  any
   23  particular  race,  creed,  color,  national  origin, sexual orientation,

   55  to  make  any  record  or  inquiry  in  connection  with the prospective

   23  status,  sex,  age,  disability,  marital status, or familial status, OR

   26    (2)  To  print  or  circulate or cause to be printed or circulated any
   27  statement, advertisement or publication, or to use any form of  applica-
   28  tion  for  the  purchase,  rental or lease of any housing accommodation,
   29  land or commercial space or to make any record or inquiry in  connection
   30  with  the  prospective purchase, rental or lease of any housing accommo-
   31  dation, land or commercial space which expresses, directly or  indirect-

   33  color, national origin, sexual orientation, military status,  sex,  age,
   34  disability,  marital  status,  or  familial  status,  OR WHERE A HOUSING
   35  ACCOMMODATION IS SOUGHT EXCLUSIVELY FOR RESIDENTIAL PURPOSES, THE  OCCU-
   36  PATION;  or  any  intent  to  make any such limitation, specification or
   37  discrimination.
   38    S 8. This act shall take effect immediately.
